name: Galactic Harvester
description: Earth is dying. Our sun has gone cold. Your farming skills might be humanity's last hope. Take your botany skills to another planet, establish a base, and grow a bountiful harvest.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 7700k Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidea GTX970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 7700k Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidea GTX970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space
